conbody.p: Tools are available to assist in generating and validating Titanium Server controller configuration input .ini files and bulk host configuration .xml file. Consult the README file in the SDK for installation instructions.
The config_gui tool prompts you for the information it needs to automatically generate valid configuration files. It is started by running config_gui from the command line.
The config_validator utility reports on errors in controller configuration input .ini files.
